title: Wanted for Commercial Armed Robbery
body:
The Prince George’s County Police Department is working to identify the suspects shown in the above surveillance photographs. On March 24 2012, at approximately 10:34 pm, the suspects committed an armed robbery at the CD Liquors located at 4945 Marlboro Pike Capitol Heights, MD. CASH REWARD$1000.00 The Suspect in the photo shown above is a male, who wore a wig and distinct women’s clothing, and could frequent the Eastern Avenue corridor.
Posted by


Prince George's County Police


at
